fields.name: OnDemandCost
fields.description: The cost without reservation. Includes hardware and software cost.

fields.name: OverageCost
fields.description: Hardware and software cost of the resources not covered by the reservation.

fields.name: ReservationCost
fields.description: Hardware cost of the resources covered by the reservation.

fields.name: ReservedUnitCount
fields.description: The number of reserved units used to calculate savings. Always 1 for virtual machines.

fields.name: Savings
fields.description: The amount saved by purchasing the recommended quantity of reservation. This is equal to onDemandCost - totalReservationCost.

fields.name: TotalReservationCost
fields.description: Reservation cost + software cost of the resources covered by the reservation + overage cost.
